description: Returns the resource policy that is set on a repository.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain containing the repository whose associated resource policy is to be retrieved.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The name of the repository whose associated resource policy is to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource associated with the resource policy.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The current revision of the resource policy.

nested_items.name: document
nested_items.description: The resource policy formatted in JSON.
